stories.title: Aeon Drive an action platformer with speedrunning elements

stories.text:
Hi HN!

As someone that comes from an academic background in programming languages, the set of conferences was pretty clear (PLDI, POPL, OOPSLA, ICFP, ...) but moving away from academia into more software engineering I have found it hard to nail down the places where developers meet.

What are your favourite software developer conferences? Also, I've seen that FOSDEM 2022 will be online - is this a trend to other conferences?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your favourite software developer conferences?

Cybercriminals claim to have hacked the NRA

stories.text:
A friend of mine suggested that It would be better if I learn C#  rather than Java. According to him, Java's OO model is a little bit. It's better tackled after learning a correct, functional object-oriented language like C#. 
What do you think?
What's the meaning of "broken"? What is the definition of a good OO model?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is the Java OO model really broken and does C# provide a better model?
